alert.note: Alert for Adair; Dallas; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Guthrie, southwestern Dallas and northeastern Adair Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guthrie Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Panorama around 1150 AM CDT. Panora around 1200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stuart. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 80 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
